long.ar:
If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, site blocker might be perfect for you. 

Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker designed to help you stay focused on your studying, learning, and the work that matters. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet has to offer.

To use Block site, simply set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let site blocker to block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, just enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you‚Äôre a parent, you can set the password for child. Or, if you‚Äôd like to use it for yourself, have a friend or partner set it for you to help you commit.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you‚Äôre studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost self-control to finish a project.

‚≠êÔ∏èFeatures‚≠êÔ∏è

üëâ Block sites including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

üëâ White list
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

üëâ Focus Mode
The focus mode timer feature enables you to control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‚ÄòFocus Mode‚Äô you can set times when to disable websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary. 

üëâ Time Management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. You‚Äôll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

üëâ Password Protection
If you strart focus mode you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it that bit harder to procrastinate. You can also password protect the options page to keep you from easily removing sites from your list.

üëâ Unstoppable Focus Mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

üëâ Funny Blocked Page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You‚Äôll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

*Note*
To block sites in incognito mode you need to activate 'Allow run in incognito mode' checkbox  in chrome://extensions page.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Features: 
Easy to use; 
The settings page is protected by a PIN code; 
A four-digit numeric code is used as a password for blocked websites;
Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.
***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.
Website blocker, Ad blocker, Content filter, Productivity, Focus, Time management, Distraction-free, Parental control, Internet safety, Addiction prevention, Website blocking, URL blocker, Domain blocker, Online security, Digital wellbeing, Cybersecurity, Internet censorship, Digital detox, Screen time control, Time limit.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

Block Site is an advanced application for blocking inappropriate content. Useful features of the application:
- Blocking sites for one or more domain names
- Blocking sites by keywords
- Setting a schedule for blocking content
- Create a white list of domains

Try our software now. Its 100% free to use.

Block access to any site on your device
Save your time, protect yourself and improve your browsing experience with absolutely free site blocker. This extension allows you to block certain websites. It pretty useful if you want to protect your children or just if you want to shield yourself from inappropriate content. Block website you want just in a few clicks. Site blocker may also come in handy if you don`t want to be annoyed by a certain website. In that case you just block site and forget about it. The extension is a real productivity tool that denies access to websites you don`t want to see.
Surf the internet safely!

Website blocker, Ad blocker, Content filter, Productivity, Focus, Time management, Distraction-free, Parental control, Internet safety, Addiction prevention, Website blocking, URL blocker, Domain blocker, Online security, Digital wellbeing, Cybersecurity, Internet censorship, Digital detox, Screen time control, Time limit.

Block website and keep working on your main tasks without being distracted. Click on the extension icon in the right upper corner of the chrome and open the app. Then you just paste the website address into the corresponding field and block site. You can also instantly use the url from the current chrome tab. Removing a website from the list is also pretty easy ‚Äì one click and done. This new site blocker extension is pretty simple but pretty useful app. Focus on what matters most and don`t get distracted. This extension is going to help you increasing your productivity at workplace. Easy to install, easy to use and absolutely free extension specially for you!

If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, site blocker might be perfect for you. 

Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker designed to help you stay focused on your studying, learning, and the work that matters. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet has to offer.

To use Block site, simply set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let site blocker to block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, just enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you‚Äôre a parent, you can set the password for child. Or, if you‚Äôd like to use it for yourself, have a friend or partner set it for you to help you commit.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you‚Äôre studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost self-control to finish a project.

‚≠êÔ∏èFeatures‚≠êÔ∏è

üëâ Block sites including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

üëâ White list
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

üëâ Focus Mode
The focus mode timer feature enables you to control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‚ÄòFocus Mode‚Äô you can set times when to disable websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary. 

üëâ Time Management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. You‚Äôll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

üëâ Password Protection
If you strart focus mode you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it that bit harder to procrastinate. You can also password protect the options page to keep you from easily removing sites from your list.

üëâ Unstoppable Focus Mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

üëâ Funny Blocked Page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You‚Äôll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

*Note*
To block sites in incognito mode you need to activate 'Allow run in incognito mode' checkbox  in chrome://extensions page.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Features: 
Easy to use; 
The settings page is protected by a PIN code; 
A four-digit numeric code is used as a password for blocked websites;
Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.
***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

Block Site is an advanced application for blocking inappropriate content. Useful features of the application:
- Blocking sites for one or more domain names
- Blocking sites by keywords
- Setting a schedule for blocking content
- Create a white list of domains

Try our software now. Its 100% free to use.

Block access to any site on your device
Save your time, protect yourself and improve your browsing experience with absolutely free site blocker. This extension allows you to block certain websites. It pretty useful if you want to protect your children or just if you want to shield yourself from inappropriate content. Block website you want just in a few clicks. Site blocker may also come in handy if you don`t want to be annoyed by a certain website. In that case you just block site and forget about it. The extension is a real productivity tool that denies access to websites you don`t want to see.
Surf the internet safely!
Block website and keep working on your main tasks without being distracted. Click on the extension icon in the right upper corner of the chrome and open the app. Then you just paste the website address into the corresponding field and block site. You can also instantly use the url from the current chrome tab. Removing a website from the list is also pretty easy ‚Äì one click and done. This new site blocker extension is pretty simple but pretty useful app. Focus on what matters most and don`t get distracted. This extension is going to help you increasing your productivity at workplace. Easy to install, easy to use and absolutely free extension specially for you!

long.en,en_AU,es_419,pt_BR,ru,uk,zh_TW:
If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, a site blocker might be perfect for you. 
 
Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker is designed to help you stay focused on studying, learning, and working. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet offers.

To use a site blocker, set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let the site blocker block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you‚Äôre a parent, you can set the password for your child. Or, if you‚Äôd like to use it yourself, have a friend or partner put it for you to help you concentrate.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you‚Äôre studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost of self-control to finish a project.

‚≠êÔ∏èFeatures‚≠êÔ∏è

üëâ Block sites, including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

üëâ Allowlist
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

üëâ Focus mode
The focus mode timer lets you control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‚ÄòFocus Mode,‚Äô you can set times to disable websites and browse freely. 

üëâ Time management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. So you‚Äôll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favourite sites and apps in between.

üëâ Password protection
If you start focus mode, you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it harder to procrastinate. You can also password-protect the options page to keep you from efficiently removing sites from your list.

üëâ Unstoppable focus mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

üëâ Funny blocked page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You‚Äôll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. 

‚≠êÔ∏èNote‚≠êÔ∏è
To block sites in incognito mode, you need to activate Allow run in incognito mode checkbox on the chrome://extensions page.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Features: 
Easy to use; 
The settings page is protected by a PIN code; 
A four-digit numeric code is used as a password for blocked websites;
Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.
***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, site blocker might be perfect for you. 
 
Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker designed to help you stay focused on your studying, learning, and the work that matters. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet has to offer.

To use Block site, simply set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let site blocker to block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, just enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you‚Äôre a parent, you can set the password for child. Or, if you‚Äôd like to use it for yourself, have a friend or partner set it for you to help you commit.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you‚Äôre studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost self-control to finish a project.

‚≠êÔ∏èFeatures‚≠êÔ∏è

üëâ Block sites including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

üëâ White list
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

üëâ Focus Mode
The focus mode timer feature enables you to control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‚ÄòFocus Mode‚Äô you can set times when to disable websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary. 

üëâ Time Management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. You‚Äôll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

üëâ Password Protection
If you strart focus mode you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it that bit harder to procrastinate. You can also password protect the options page to keep you from easily removing sites from your list.

üëâ Unstoppable Focus Mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

üëâ Funny Blocked Page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You‚Äôll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

*Note*
To block sites in incognito mode you need to activate 'Allow run in incognito mode' checkbox  in chrome://extensions page.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Features: 
Easy to use; 
The settings page is protected by a PIN code; 
A four-digit numeric code is used as a password for blocked websites;
Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.
***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

Block Site is an advanced application for blocking inappropriate content. Useful features of the application:
- Blocking sites for one or more domain names
- Blocking sites by keywords
- Setting a schedule for blocking content
- Create a white list of domains

Try our software now. Its 100% free to use.

long.ms:
Jika anda mahukan sedikit masa untuk menyemak imbas dalam talian tetapi berharap untuk mengelakkan lingkaran internet sepenuhnya, penyekat tapak mungkin sesuai untuk anda.

Tetapkan had masa untuk tapak yang mengganggu. Apabila anda mencapai had, satu blok masuk ke tempatnya. Ini bermakna anda masih boleh menyemak suapan anda dari semasa ke semasa, cuma tidak terlalu lama atau terlalu kerap.

Penyekat tapak direka untuk membantu anda kekal fokus pada pembelajaran, pembelajaran dan kerja yang penting. Menyekat semua tapak web mengikut masa untuk memastikan anda produktif dan jauh daripada semua gangguan yang ditawarkan oleh internet.

Untuk menggunakan Sekat tapak, cuma tetapkan kata laluan, tentukan tapak web yang ingin anda akses dan biarkan penyekat tapak menyekat yang lain. Jika anda ingin melawat tapak yang anda telah sekat, hanya masukkan kata laluan anda dan tentukan berapa lama anda mahu berada di tapak yang disekat itu.

Jika anda ibu bapa, anda boleh menetapkan kata laluan untuk anak. Atau, jika anda ingin menggunakannya untuk diri sendiri, minta rakan atau pasangan menetapkannya untuk membantu anda komited.

Dan voila! Anda kini mempunyai satu set pagar internet yang membantu anda kekal produktif dan menjalankan tugas sama ada anda sedang belajar, pembelajaran jarak jauh atau memerlukan rangsangan tambahan kawalan diri untuk menyelesaikan projek.

‚≠êÔ∏èCiri‚≠êÔ∏è

üëâ Sekat tapak termasuk subdomainnya
Alih keluar semua tapak web yang mengganggu dan berbahaya daripada kehidupan anda dengan menyekatnya untuk anda sementara anda perlu kekal fokus dan produktif.

üëâ Senarai putih
Tambahkan pengecualian pada senarai tapak web yang disekat. Tapak daripada senarai ini mengelakkan semua tetapan menyekat.

üëâ Mod Fokus
Ciri pemasa mod fokus membolehkan anda mengawal jadual anda melalui pemasa teknik Pomodoro. Pecahkan tugas anda kepada selang waktu diikuti dengan rehat yang singkat. Dengan 'Mod Fokus' anda boleh menetapkan masa untuk melumpuhkan tapak web dan masa untuk menyemak imbas dengan bebas - tiada kemahuan diperlukan.

üëâ Pengurusan Masa
Tunjukkan berapa banyak kitaran kerja yang anda selesaikan semasa sesi. Anda akan dapat menyelesaikan semua tugas anda dan masih mempunyai masa untuk menyemak imbas tapak dan apl kegemaran anda di antaranya.

üëâ Perlindungan Kata Laluan
Jika anda strart mod fokus anda boleh menghentikannya dengan kod laluan pilihan anda, menjadikannya lebih sukar untuk menangguhkan. Anda juga boleh melindungi kata laluan halaman pilihan untuk menghalang anda daripada mengalih keluar tapak dengan mudah daripada senarai anda.

üëâ Mod Fokus Tidak Boleh Dihalang
Pilih pilihan untuk menyembunyikan butang jeda dan henti dalam tetapan sambungan. Dan anda tidak akan dapat berhenti menyekat tapak sehingga masa sekatan tamat.

üëâ Halaman Tersekat Lucu
Anda kini akan melihat imej lucu jika anda cuba memasuki tapak yang disekat. Untuk melakukan ini, anda perlu mendayakan pilihan ini dalam tetapan penyekatan tapak. Anda masih tidak akan dapat memasuki tapak yang disekat, tetapi mungkin gambar lucu akan membuat anda tersenyum :))

Tapak Sekat ialah salah satu alat produktiviti terbaik yang tersedia untuk membantu orang ramai kurang berlengah-lengah, menjadi lebih produktif dan mencapai matlamat hidup mereka. Anda tidak perlu risau lagi tentang cara untuk kekal fokus di tempat kerja. Jadi apa tunggu lagi? Muat turun sekarang dan mula mengawal masa anda...hari ini!

*Catatan*
Untuk menyekat tapak dalam mod inkognito anda perlu mengaktifkan kotak pilihan 'Benarkan jalankan dalam mod inkognito' dalam halaman chrome://extensions.
long.nl:
Als je wat tijd wilt om online te browsen, maar een volledige internetspiraal wilt vermijden, is site blocker misschien perfect voor jou.

Stel een tijdslimiet in voor afleidende sites. Wanneer je de limiet bereikt, gaat er een blokkering in. Dat betekent dat je nog steeds af en toe je feed kunt controleren, alleen niet te lang of te vaak.

Siteblocker ontworpen om u te helpen gefocust te blijven op uw studie, leren en het werk dat ertoe doet. Blokkeert alle tijdrovende websites om u productief te houden en weg te houden van alle afleidingen die het internet te bieden heeft.

Om Site blokkeren te gebruiken, stelt u eenvoudig een wachtwoord in, bepaalt u tot welke websites u toegang wilt en laat u de siteblokkering de rest blokkeren. Als u een site wilt bezoeken die u heeft geblokkeerd, voert u gewoon uw wachtwoord in en bepaalt u hoe lang u op de geblokkeerde site wilt blijven.

Als u een ouder bent, kunt u het wachtwoord voor het kind instellen. Of, als je het voor jezelf wilt gebruiken, laat een vriend of partner het voor je instellen om je te helpen vast te leggen.

En voila! Je hebt nu een aantal internet-vangrails die je helpen productief en gefocust te blijven, of je nu studeert, leren op afstand of een extra boost in zelfbeheersing nodig hebt om een project af te ronden.

‚≠êÔ∏èKenmerken‚≠êÔ∏è

üëâ Blokkeer sites inclusief de subdomeinen
Verwijder alle afleidende en schadelijke websites uit uw leven door ze voor u te blokkeren terwijl u gefocust en productief moet blijven.

üëâ Witte lijst
Voeg uitzonderingen toe aan de lijst met geblokkeerde websites. Sites uit deze lijst vermijden alle blokkeringsinstellingen.

üëâ Focusmodus
Met de timerfunctie van de focusmodus kunt u uw schema regelen via de Pomodoro-techniektimer. Verdeel uw taken in intervallen gevolgd door een korte pauze. Met 'Focus Mode' kunt u tijden instellen waarop u websites wilt uitschakelen en wanneer u vrij wilt browsen - geen wilskracht nodig.

üëâ Tijdmanagement
Laat zien hoeveel werkcycli u tijdens een sessie hebt voltooid. U kunt al uw taken uitvoeren en tussendoor nog steeds tijd hebben om door uw favoriete sites en apps te bladeren.

üëâ Wachtwoordbeveiliging
Als u de focusmodus start, kunt u deze stoppen met een toegangscode naar keuze, waardoor het net iets moeilijker wordt om uit te stellen. U kunt de optiepagina ook met een wachtwoord beveiligen om te voorkomen dat u sites gemakkelijk uit uw lijst verwijdert.

üëâ Niet te stoppen focusmodus
Selecteer de optie om de pauze- en stopknoppen te verbergen in de extensie-instellingen. En u kunt het blokkeren van sites pas stoppen als de blokkeringstijd is verstreken.

üëâ Grappige geblokkeerde pagina
Je ziet nu grappige afbeeldingen als je een geblokkeerde site probeert te betreden. Om dit te doen, moet u deze optie inschakelen in de instellingen voor het blokkeren van sites. Je kunt de geblokkeerde site nog steeds niet betreden, maar misschien zal een grappige foto je aan het lachen maken :))

Block Site is een van de beste beschikbare productiviteitstools om mensen te helpen minder uit te stellen, productiever te worden en hun levensdoelen te bereiken. U hoeft zich nooit meer zorgen te maken over hoe u gefocust kunt blijven op het werk. Dus waar wacht je op? Download nu en begin vandaag nog de controle over uw tijd te nemen!

*Opmerking*
Om sites in de incognitomodus te blokkeren, moet u het selectievakje 'Uitvoeren in incognitomodus toestaan' op de chrome://extensions-pagina activeren.
